RollupAsAService.Solutions: RaaS offers a layer of abstraction over Rollup frameworks and SDKs to make it easy to deploy, maintain, and build on top of custom, production-grade application-specific rollups (AppRollups). RaaS empowers developers to focus on building the application layer, turning what used to take multiple engineers dozens of hours into a 10 minute no-code deployment process.
KeyFeatures: Fast, consistent push notifications with Webhooks
Real-time data for custom events with Custom Webhooks
Blockchain connection for ongoing data with Smart Websockets
Speedy indexing for custom GraphQL APIs with Subgraphs
Complete transaction history in one call with Transfers API
Transaction previews for any use case with Transaction Simulation
Cover gas costs for your users with Gas Manager API
Reliably land UserOps onchain with Bundler API
Open-source ERC-4337 SDK with AA SDK
